metadata.Title: CVE-2019-7443 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: KDE KAuth before 5.55 allows the passing of parameters with arbitrary types to helpers running as root over DBus via DBusHelperProxy.cpp. Certain types can cause crashes, and trigger the decoding of arbitrary images with dynamically loaded plugins. In other words, KAuth unintentionally causes this plugin code to run as root, which increases the severity of any possible exploitation of a plugin vulnerability.

criterions.comment: kauth package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
